error_connection_downloadOrTroubleshoot.message: You can download $2 or troubleshoot the connection if necessary.

error_connection_save.description: $1 will contain the localized string 'Zotero Connector'. $2 will contain the app name. $3 will contain the domain name.
error_connection_save.message: The $1 was unable to communicate with the $2 desktop application. The Connector can save some pages directly to your $3 account, but for best results you should make sure $2 is open before attempting to save.

integration_error_connection.description: $1 will be the localized string for the extension (e.g., Zotero Connector). $2 will be the app name (e.g., Zotero).
integration_error_connection.message: The $1 was unable to communicate with the $2 desktop application. $2 must be open to use web-based citing.

progressWindow_error_fallback.description: The placeholders will contain the names of Zotero translators (e.g., JSTOR or Embedded Metadata).
progressWindow_error_fallback.message: An error occurred saving with $1. Attempting to save using $2 instead.

progressWindow_error_translation.message: An error occurred while saving this item. See $1 for more information.

progressWindow_error_upgradeClient.description: $2 will be a link with the localized text 'latest version'.
progressWindow_error_upgradeClient.message: This feature is not supported by your version of $1. Please upgrade to the $2.
